name: simple-json-template
description: Simple template engine to generate json structures
author: Steven Hermans

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && (mkdir dist || true) && cp package.json dist && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist/* && (mkdir dist || true) && cp package.json dist && tsc -p tsconfig.json -w
scripts.test: rm -rf dist/* && (mkdir dist || true) && cp package.json dist && tsc -p tsconfig.json && mocha ./dist/**/*.spec.js
